Title: Relates to the composition of the state board of parole
Summary: Requires that the state board of parole include a member who is a current or former member of law enforcement, a member who has in the past been a victim of a crime or the representative of a victim of a past crime and a member who is an individual who was formerly incarcerated and has satisfied all conditions of post-incarceration release, including parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the composition of the board of parole
